search_header: Get help from expert companies in your area
your_message: Type the message and press Enter
buyer_text: Phadder is a procurement service. If you are looking for better, safer and more profitable business then this is the service for you. Start by creating a user account and create a service request. We will send a notification to selected service providers in your area, and you will soon receive bids and price suggestions.
service_text: Phadder is a procurement service. If you are looking for a better, safer and more profitable business, then this is the service for you.
buyer-banner: LOOKING FOR A SUPPLIER? WE ARE OPEN FOR BUSINESS!
supplier-banner: MANY BUYERS. PLENTY OF OPPORTUNITIES. ONE MARKETPLACE.
buyers_p1: Select a location and project category that best matches your business need.
buyers_p2: Tell us about your project to ensure we're able to match you to the right pro for your job.
buyers_p3: Phadder has several service providers specializing in over 20 business categories.
buyers_p4: Your request will be presented to up to four pre-screened, verified, local Phadder Service Suppliers.
buyers_p5: After 24 h, your request will be listed on our site for other Phadder Service Suppliers to see and respond to.
buyers_p6: Shortly after posting your service request, you start receiving bids and proposals to choose from.
buyers_p7: Connect with your selected service providers to negotiate terms.
buyers_p8: Use Phadders Smart E-greements Service to secure the legal agreement with your selected provider. (optional)
suppliers_p1: Complete an online application to join the exclusive Phadder Service Supplier community.
suppliers_p2: As a Service Supplier, you'll gain access to a stream of project requests from our international client community. Now you’re ready to provide your services to new clients in your area - Better, Safer and More Profitable.
suppliers_p3: It's all within your reach! Register during the Pre Release period and get 50% discount on the Verified Supplier Badge (optional)
suppliers_p4: Networks and referrals are the main reasons for accepting bids and making purchases. With Phadder, your business will be able to build an online reputation and grow your business.
suppliers_p5: Make diversity into a competitive advantage. Benefit from the multi-cultural composition of your team. The unique multi-language approach of Phadder makes it possible for your clients to communicate with you in their native language.
suppliers_p6: A basic membership on Phadder is FREE, but even the paid Verified Supplier Badge costs significantly less than many other classic sales channels and can generate up to three times as many leads. In addition, the majority of business owners, prefer to look for suppliers and service providers online.
cover_info: Phadder B2B Marketplace is designed to make corporate buying of business services fast, agile and cost effective.
profile-pic-description: A new picture helps making your site more personal, and sometimes thats helps for better deals.
